rows.label: qev087001_MSG0001
rows.name:
Had I known I'd be forced to wait,
I would have brought a book.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0002
rows.name:
Our apologies, Director General. Our BLADE work
has been keeping us especially busy as of late.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0003
rows.name: Besides, it's pretty unusual to get a direct request from you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0004
rows.name:
I would hope that warrants it special priority.
This mission affects us all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0005
rows.name:
If it's an official mission,
shouldn't we take it through the normal channels?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0006
rows.name:
Personally, I consider it very official,
but both Nagi and Vandham refused me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0007
rows.name: Shouted me down, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0008
rows.name:
What? Then we're probably not even
ALLOWED to take it, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0009
rows.name: Let's hear the briefâ€”AND why they turned you down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0010
rows.name: A wise decision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0011
rows.name: You're familiar with Jair Fortress, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0012
rows.name: In a few days, we'll be hitting it with a surprise offensive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0013
rows.name: Of course! Every BLADE on the force is participating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0014
rows.name:
We built our attack strategy around the idea
of limiting casualties as much as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0015
rows.name: As such, we'll be employing mostly long-range fighting tactics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0016
rows.name: That would be the sensible choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0017
rows.name:
Yes, and I fully support it.
But it makes gathering intel nearly impossible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_JNK0010
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev087001_SEL0011
rows.name:
Ask the director general what
kind of intel he's looking for.

rows.label: qev087001_JNK0020
rows.name: Argue

rows.label: qev087001_SEL0021
rows.name: Claim that lives are more important than intel.

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0018
rows.name: Data on the present state of the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0019
rows.name: At the moment, we know next to nothing about their situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0020
rows.name:
We don't even know if it's possible to
negotiate with them or not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0021
rows.name:
We NEED more information in order to
effectively formulate future plans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0022
rows.name: Unfortunately, it's not that simple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0023
rows.name:
If we can secure this information now,
it will aid us in every future battle we face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0024
rows.name: It could also offer leverage in bargaining for an accord.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0025
rows.name:
I think you'll agree, this has the potential
to save far more lives in the long run.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0026
rows.name:
All right, you've made your ideas clear.
What do you want us to do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0027
rows.name: Infiltrate the fortress before we strike.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0028
rows.name: Gather whatever intel you can and return here with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0029
rows.name: Is that even possible?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0030
rows.name: Any answer I give would be idle speculation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0031
rows.name: But I do believe this mission is of the utmost importance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0032
rows.name:
And I also believe that your team
has the best chance of getting it done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0033
rows.name:
So you decided to ask us face-to-face?
That's quite the honor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0034
rows.name: Is that sarcasm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0035
rows.name: Take it as you will, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0036
rows.name: What if we refuse?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0037
rows.name:
Then I'll ask the team with the
next highest chances, and so on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0038
rows.name: I'll send in the damn janitors if I have to. Whatever it takes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0039
rows.name: You truly believe it's this important?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0040
rows.name: I do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0041
rows.name: All right, then. We'll do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0042
rows.name: Excellent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0043
rows.name: But we're not taking any unnecessary risks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0044
rows.name: If things get hairy, we'll cut and run empty-handed if we must.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0045
rows.name: Let's all hope it never comes to that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0046
rows.name: Just one question, if I may:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0047
rows.name: Are those really your only reasons for wanting this intel?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0048
rows.name: What other reasons would there be?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0049
rows.name: Heh. Any answer I give would be idle speculation. ...Sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0050
rows.name:
My goal has always been to secure a future for
humanity on this planet. It's as simple as that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0051
rows.name: All right. I'll take you at your word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087001_MSG0052
rows.name:
Let's get back to the barracks and prepare.
This one's going to be tough.[ST:wait ]
